data.title: Travels in America performed in 1806, for the purpose of exploring the rivers Alleghany, Monongahela, Ohio, and Mississippi, and ascertaining the produce and condition of their banks and vicinity.
data.meta_description: Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress Web site.
data.text:
The contents of the Library of Congress American Notes: Travels in America, 1750 to 1920 Collection are in the public domain and are free to use and reuse.
